pages.text:
Ethan Register
General Manager
Meet Ethan
Ethan Register, General Manager of Harrison's Kitchen & Bar and Hotel Indigo, is originally from Georgia—Go Dawgs! Now a proud local, Ethan has lived in Bay County for over 22 years, graduating from Florida State University-Panama City (FSU-PC) with a degree in business administration. With extensive experience in hospitality, including his prior role as COO for Hilton Inc., Ethan is deeply committed to both his community and his professional career. He serves as City Councilman for Ward 2 in Panama City Beach and is actively involved in local business and civic life. Ethan currently serves on the PCB Tourism Development Council and the Military Affairs Committee and has previously served on the PCB Planning Board and Panama City Economic Development Board. Outside of work, Ethan enjoys spending time with his wife, Heather, and their two daughters, as well as golfing, hunting, and fishing.
Keith
Kubisz
Director of Food & Beverage
Meet Keith
Bringing over 30 years of experience is Food and Beverage Director, Keith Kubisz, who oversees both Harrison’s Kitchen & Bar and Hotel Indigo. Most recently, Keith served as Director of Operations and Executive Food and Beverage Director for Hilton Inc., where he managed three properties. A proud Bay County resident for over three decades, he lives with his wife, Monica, and their two children, Zachary and Jeremy. He is also a grandfather to two grandsons. In addition to his career in hospitality, Keith is an avid runner, having completed eight marathons, including three Dopey Challenges at Walt Disney World, and more than 50 half marathons.

Live Entertainment & More
Special Event Details
At Harrison’s, we're always serving up something exciting and fun at the restaurant and bar. From our daily happy hour to our signature events, you'll find something to enjoy any time of the year.
*All events are subject to change; please stay tuned to this page for updates.
Follow us on Facebook and Instagram for the most up-to-date events, specials & menus!
Seasonal Events
Weekly Live Music
Follow us on Facebook for the most up-to-date schedule of performers every month.
Happy Hour
Monday-Friday from 3-6 pm
$5 House Wine
Half Off Well & Draft Drinks
Military/First Responder Discount
Present ID for 15% off your total
Not applicable during happy hour or specials
AUGUST
Teacher Appreciation month
Present ID for %15 off your total
Not applicable during happy hour or specials
SEPTEMBER - OCTOBER
Backstage Pass
Bay Arts Alliance
Live music on the marina lawn every Friday. Free to attend just bring a chair!
Monthly Events
SUNDAY, FEBRUARY 9
Game Day Grub – Catering Special
Ensure your game day spread is a touchdown with our delicious catering options! Whether you’re rooting for your favorite team or just in it for the snacks, let us handle the food while you enjoy the game stress-free. Let us cater your home party!
Place your order by February 7 - 850.979.5550 or info@harrisonskitchenandbar.com
Pickup before 5 pm. 25% deposit required.
Learn more
FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 13-15
Valentine’s Day at Harrison’s
The table is set! Grab your special someone and join us for an intimate Valentine’s Day dinner with a view and select feature menu.
Take home a souvenir charcuterie board offered on February 14 only -
while supplies last
.
$135 Per Couple
Pre-fixe menu available February 13-15 starting at 4 pm. (Regular Menu Available)
The menu includes 2 complimentary glasses of wine or champagne.
Reservations are encouraged on February 14.
Walk-ins are served on a first-come-first-served basis.
Call or Email to reserve: 850.979.5550 -
info@harrisonskitchenandbar.com
Learn more
FEBRUARY 27
National Chili Day
Enjoy Harrison’s homemade chili served with cast iron cornbread and jalapeño bacon butter all weekend (Cup 10 | Bowl 15)
Served Thursday-Sunday.
MARCH 3-7  |  ALL-DAY
Mardi Gras Menu Features
Laissez les bons temps rouler at Harrison’s with our Mardi Gras Feature Menu, available all week long! Indulge in festive favorites like fresh oysters, seafood gumbo, beignets, and more. Don’t miss out on this flavor-packed celebration — come grab a taste of the Big Easy right here on the waterfront!
Feature Menu
MONDAY, MARCH 17  |  ALL-DAY
St. Patrick’s Day Party
Join us at Harrison’s Kitchen + Bar! Enjoy live music and a feature menu. Green beer, corned beef, pretzels, and more are available all day long!
SUNDAY, APRIL 20  |  10 AM – 3 PM  |  First Come, First Served
Easter Sunday at Harrison’s
Hop on over to Harrison's this Easter! Annual Easter Sunday festivities at Harrison's. Enjoy a special brunch menu, Easter Bunny photos, and Live Music!
*No reservations, no buffet, regular menu also available.
Learn more
SUNDAY,  MAY 11 | 10 AM – 2 PM
Mother’s Day Brunch
Treat mom to brunch at Harrison's this Mother's Day! Enjoy a special brunch buffet menu from 10AM-2PM on Sunday, May 11th. First come, first served.
*No reservations, regular menu not available.
Learn more
FRIDAY, MAY 23 - MONDAY, MAY 26
Memorial Day Weekend
Present your military ID for a 15% discount on your purchases all day.
SUNDAY, JUNE 15
Father’s Day Features
Join us for a fantastic Father’s Day celebration with a special feature menu in addition to our regular dining options. Enjoy half-off bar specials and live music as we honor all the amazing dads. Make it a memorable weekend at Harrison’s!
FRIDAY, JULY 4
Harrison’s Inaugural Red, White & Boil Event
Join us at Harrison’s for a VIP Fourth of July experience like no other! Enjoy a front-row seat to the fireworks with our Red, White & Boil package, featuring a reserved table, a delicious seafood boil, VIP perks, and exclusive access to concerts at the marina.
$500 for 6 People
Each picnic table can seat and serve up to 8 people – $50 per each additional person (up to 8).
Booking Required
Call (850)979-5550 or email
info@harrisonskitchenandbar.com
to make your reservation!
Menu:
3 lbs Peel and Eat Shrimp
2 lbs Snow Crab Clusters
3 lbs Whole Crawfish
2 lbs Andouille Sausage
3 lbs Red Potatoes
12 Corn Cobettes
12 Hard-Boiled Eggs
Boil Seasoned with Old Bay, Citrus, Cajun Spices, and Herbs
Learn more
AUGUST
Teacher Appreciation Month
Teachers & School Staff, present your school ID to receive 15% off your order.
MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 1
Labor Day Celebration
Celebrate the long weekend with us at Harrison’s Kitchen & Bar! We’re serving up a special backyard BBQ menu packed with all your favorite cookout flavors, available all weekend long!
Backyard BBQ Menu All Day
Served inside August 29 – September 1
SEPTEMBER
Football Season Specials
Are you as excited about football season as we are? Enjoy specialty drinks every day that games are played as you root on your favorite team at Harrison’s!
(Sunday, Monday, Thursday, Saturday)
FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 26  |  All Day
Oktoberfest Celebration
Join us all week to celebrate Oktoberfest at Harrison’s Kitchen & Bar! Enjoy a special menu featuring classic German favorites and more. Prost to an unforgettable week!
Served inside all week- September 22-26.
FRIDAY, OCTOBER 31
Halloween Fest
More information coming soon!
TUESDAY, NOVEMBER 11  |  ALL DAY
Veterans Day
Enjoy menu features and celebrate all those who have served with us. Present your military ID for a 15% discount on your purchases all day long.
THURSDAY, NOVEMBER 28
Thanksgiving Day Takeaways
Spend time with your family and let us handle the cooking this year! Enjoy a family Thanksgiving meal for 6 with all of the fixings.
$295 Per Order
Place your order by November 21 at 6 pm
Pick up 11 am – 3 pm
THURSDAY, NOVEMBER 28  |  11 am - 5 pm
Thanksgiving Day Buffet
Enjoy a specially crafted buffet menu with all of your favorite Thanksgiving classics. Take the pressure off this year and dine with a view at Harrison’s.
$55 Adults (13+)
$22 Children (4-12)
Reservations Encouraged - Seatings at 11 am, 1 pm, 3 pm
Dinner service not available
SUNDAY, DECEMBER 14  |  10 am - 2 pm
2nd Annual Merry Grinchmas Brunch
Step into Whoville and join us for a festive holiday brunch on Sunday, December 14! The Grinch himself will be visiting for photos from 11 am to 1 pm before he tries to steal Christmas again this year. Enjoy a delicious brunch menu, plus a hot chocolate station and Christmas sugar cookies—fun for all ages! Gather your family and friends and help us save Christmas at Harrison’s!
